34.text: Reagan sounded positive notes reminiscent of earlier speeches throughout his political career _ the pre-eminent position of ` ` We the People' ' in the American system, the image of America as a shining ` ` city upon a hill,' ' the importance of paying more attention to American history.

35.text: There was no mention of the ` ` iron triangle' ' of members of Congress, the news media and special interest groups who, in a speech to political appointees in Washington on Dec. 13, Reagan claimed had prevented his administration from balancing the federal budget.

36.text: Nor did he argue, as he did in a speech at the University of Virginia in Charlottesville Dec. 16, that Congress had perpetuated a dangerous situation in Central America by its ` ` on-again, off-again indecisiveness' ' on his program of aid to the anti-communist Contra rebels.
